title: Actor Tony Hale, Dak Has A Problem, Mt Rushmore Of Things We Over Think & Fyre Fest
description:
On todayâ€™s Pardon My Take the boys are live from an undisclosed location talking about the Cowboys totally not being worried about Dak Prescot + NFL Preseason talk (00;02;26 - 00;08:56), baseball stays relevant with the Field of Dreams game, NFL preseason (00;08:56 - . We do the Mount Rushmore of things you overthink (00;18:21 - 00;41:21). Plus an interview with Tony Hale from Veep and Arrested Development (00;41:21 - 01;11:06). We close out with fyrefest of the week and a heartfelt message from Hank
